on the nonexistence of a phrase structure grammar for algol 60 is defined partly by formal mechanisms phrase structure grammar informally stated restrictions it shown that no type used are sufficient to define cacm september 1962 floyd r w ca620909 jb march 17 1978 7 33 pm 249 4 483 254 272 1102 1109 1140 1188 1306 1464 1491 1767 1781 1787 1949 321 2059 2126 435 437 463 491 2732 560 583 3073 627 631 632 642 644 653 680 761 762 763 123 140 919 989 196 5 949 1142 1945 823 6 914 915 917 984 990 1007 1012 1046 1084 1098 1122 1131 1138 1139 1141 1149 1198 1200 1215 1223 1265 1303 1323 1336 1358 1366 1396 1421 1455 1460 1462 1463 1467 1468 1477 1487 1496 1531 1535 1565 1601 1602 1613 1614 1626 1641 1788 205 209 210 224 288 316 381 398 11 404 406 410 464 3184 3188 584 600 669 691 799
